BadgeDetail.Name: Creativity
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they are able to apply creative thinking techniques to generate ideas that have value, either individually or as a group.They can work creatively with others to brainstorm, blend different ideas and concepts together, and evaluate which ideas are worthy of further exploration.

Task.Title: There is no box
Task.Body: Upload any artefact that demonstrates your imagination, creativity or inventiveness. Examples could include piece of art, a photo of a brainstorming session, a new product or business idea, or a short story you’ve written. The only limit is your imagination.
